text: Located in B2 where the food court are. Follow the ATM sign. No withdrawal fee for foreign card.
T3 Arrival Hall,  Level B1 ATMs, near Belt 45 to 48 Exit
Convenient location in the center next to other atms

It is quietly located at the far end on the left after exiting Changi Airport Terminal 2.
I withdrew $90 using revolut cash withdrawal.
This ATM is probably the only one that doesn't charge a fee.
